price: ߡߊ߬ߛߍ߲߬ߛߍ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߓߍ߯ ߘߐ߫ ߖߎ߯ߡߊ߲ ߊߟߊ߫ ߓߟߏ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi alladhīna kafarū fahum lā yu'minūna
